page.title: 07THE GOLDEN FLEECE PUB (2)
page.content: Each week Bill and is wife clean the pumps from the cellar to the bar. He thinks that it is very important to look after the beer cellar well because it keeps the beer better. In winter there is always an open fire which he believes that the customers like. During the week the main customers are from the village, partiicularly in winter. but at the weekends and in the summer Bill has lots of customers from all over the county. Bill and his wife also serve meals which are becoming increasingly popular in public houses. Also the Golden Fleece has a lonely beer garden which on a warm day is full with families.
